name: CyberSiege VR
description:
The project is now live! Download for free or pay whatever you want to download the game!

* HTC Vive is required to play.

CyberSiege VR, the first game created by the Jubiliant Kiwi Productions team, and one of many games made by the developers, is a cyber-fantasy shooter where you are tasked with saving this computer world from being destroyed by a virus.

CyberSiege is a program that is capable of dealing with such threats, but to save the computer, you will have to fight every inch of the way!

Features

• Fast-paced action where you are constantly at risk of enemy attacks. Defend yourself using your shield and fight back using a bug-fighting gun.

• Feel immersed by the sights and sounds of a computer world that takes the form of an 80's futuristic, Tron-inspired city.

• Use minions to aid you on your mission of saving the computer.

• Plan out strategies to survive and earn higher scores.

Developers
